### Charting the future of SOC: Human and AI collaboration for better security


üõ°Ô∏è **SECURITY ALERT**


The article discusses the evolving landscape of Security Operations Centers (SOCs) as they integrate artificial intelligence (AI) to enhance cybersecurity measures. It highlights the necessity for collaboration between human experts and AI technologies to address the growing complexity and volume of security threats. By leveraging AI for tasks like threat detection and data analysis, SOCs can improve their efficiency and effectiveness. However, human expertise remains crucial for interpreting AI findings and making informed decisions. The article emphasizes that the combination of human skills and AI capabilities is essential

**[Read the full article ‚Ä∫](https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/blog/microsoftsecurityexperts/charting-the-future-of-soc-human-and-ai-collaboration-for-better-security/4470688?utm_source=newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=weekly_ai_cybersecurity&utm_content=article_7376)**

### EFF to Arizona Federal Court: Protect Public School Students from Surveillance and Punishment for Off-Campus Speech


üìä **TECH INSIGHT**


The Electronic Frontier Foundation (EFF) has called on a federal court in Arizona to protect public school students from excessive surveillance and disciplinary actions related to their off-campus speech. EFF argues that monitoring students' online activities and punishing them for expressions made outside of school grounds violates their First Amendment rights. The organization emphasizes the importance of supporting students' freedom of speech and privacy, asserting that such surveillance practices could chill free expression and disproportionately impact marginalized students. In its advocacy, EFF seeks to establish legal safeguards

**[Read the full article ‚Ä∫](https://www.eff.org/deeplinks/2025/11/eff-arizona-federal-court-protect-public-school-students-surveillance-and?utm_source=newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=weekly_ai_cybersecurity&utm_content=article_2168)**
